title: Roster Stunner: Tom Pidcock Claims He’s ‘Deselected’ for Lombardia
content:
Pidcock sparks fresh intrigue and speculation after being unexpectedly left out of Ineos Grenadiers' lineup for the season-ending Italian monument: 'I guess off-season starts early.'

Read the full article at Roster Stunner: Tom Pidcock Claims He’s ‘Deselected’ for Lombardia on Velo.
author: ahood
